CustomField.description: This field was created for MW0001719 - it is to help identify whether the lead came in via over the counter, the Internet or both
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to distinguish between the verification of identity (VOI) for Property Transfers channel/product each conveyancer/lawyer/mortgagee (CLM) has registered with Australia Post to use.
CustomField.label: Registration Type
